onyomiExamples.meaning: disposal, abandonment, scrapping, discarding, abolition, annulment, cancellation, abrogation, repeal
reform and (or) abolition, alteration or repeal, revision, reorganization, reorganisation

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to go out of use, to become obsolete, to die out, to go out of fashion
to go out of use, to become obsolete, to die out, to go out of fashion, to become lost (e.g. of dignity), to be sullied
